public abstract class AbstractUser

setEncryptedPassword

protected void setEncryptedPassword(java.lang.String _encryptedPassword)
This method can be used for subclasses to set the password without it being encrypted again. Some subclass might have knowledge of the encrypted password and needs to be able to set it.

Parameters:
_encryptedPassword - the encrypted password

getEncryptedPassword

protected java.lang.String getEncryptedPassword()
Get the encrypted password

Returns:
the encrypted password

getDefaultDocumentLocale

public java.lang.String getDefaultDocumentLocale()
Description copied from interface: User
Returns the user's default locale of documents to be created or edited. The locale can either be a 2 letter country code (de, en) or a locale code according to RFC 1766 / ISO 639 / ISO 3166 (de_DE, de_CH, de_AT, en_US, ...)

Specified by:
getDefaultDocumentLocale in interface User
Returns:
Returns the defaultDocumentLocale.

setDefaultDocumentLocale

public void setDefaultDocumentLocale(java.lang.String defaultDocumentLocale)
Description copied from interface: User
Sets the user's default locale of documents to be created or edited. The locale can either be a 2 letter country code (de, en) or a locale code according to RFC 1766 / ISO 639 / ISO 3166 (de_DE, de_CH, de_AT, en_US, ...)

Specified by:
setDefaultDocumentLocale in interface User
Parameters:
defaultDocumentLocale - The defaultDocumentLocale to set.

getDefaultMenuLocale

public java.lang.String getDefaultMenuLocale()
Description copied from interface: User
Returns the user's preferred locale for the Lenya CMS menus and CMS screens. The locale can either be a 2 letter country code (de, en) or a locale code according to RFC 1766 / ISO 639 / ISO 3166 (de_DE, de_CH, de_AT, en_US, ...)

Specified by:
getDefaultMenuLocale in interface User
Returns:
Returns the defaultMenuLocale.

setDefaultMenuLocale

public void setDefaultMenuLocale(java.lang.String defaultMenuLocale)
Description copied from interface: User
Sets the user's preferred locale for the Lenya menu and CMS screens. The locale can either be a 2 letter country code (de, en) or a locale code according to RFC 1766 / ISO 639 / ISO 3166 (de_DE, de_CH, de_AT, en_US, ...)

Specified by:
setDefaultMenuLocale in interface User
Parameters:
defaultMenuLocale - The defaultMenuLocale to set.

authenticate

public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String password)
Authenticate a user. This is done by encrypting the given password and comparing this to the encryptedPassword.

Specified by:
authenticate in interface User
Parameters:
password - to authenticate with
Returns:
true if the given password matches the password for this user
